hicpp-function-size.description:
Description

This check is an alias for
readability-function-size
.
Useful to enforce multiple sections on function complexity.

rule 8.2.2

rule 8.3.2
hicpp-function-size.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
